resources.string:
CyFile is a professional note locker developed to be a reliable tool for saving your important files in a secure and private way. Designed with a clean, minimalistic, interface CyFile makes use of top-notch encryption and hiding techniques as a robust utility.


WARNING: CyFile might not support all devices due to various manufacturer changes which can affect the application’s ability to function properly.


FEATURES
 ▪ Write, edit and save notes on your device.
 ▪ Hide CyFile on your device in Stealth Mode.
 ▪ Lock CyFile from unauthorized access
 ▪ Search, sort your notes
 ▪ Obfuscate your notes from other apps
 ▪ Sort recordings by date, time and modification



ATTENTION: CyFile requires power-saving options to exempt the application in order for the Stealth Mode to work correctly.


Stealth Mode allows CyFile to be an effective secure locker that can hide your files away from prying eyes.

The notes are stored in a secure way on this device. No data is uploaded or shared to anyone else. The user is fully responsible about the state of the notes.
We provide the application on an AS IS basis and therefore the user is expected to be responsible about the contents within the application.
This application, whilst secure, cannot be a replacement for better security options and we do not advise providing legal notices or criminal information as the underlying system can be also hacked.
The notes can be created in a simple, easy way and the application can be hidden in a simple way.
All Copyrights owned by CyFile Corp.
If you encounter any technical issues, you can send an e-mail to support@cyfile.com
